
project( ${TARGET_PREFIX}external LANGUAGES CXX C )

message( "> extern:" )

# add disired compiler flags to extern libraries but not to our own sources
enable_cxx_compiler_flag_if_supported( "-w" ) # suppress warnings generated by external libraries

# Use the extern function to easily combine external dependencies into a single link-able ui.
# See helpers.cmake for the function definition and instructions.

add_subdirectory( SDL-mirror )
extern( link SDL2main )
extern( link SDL2-static )

add_subdirectory( glm )
extern( link glm )

# Create an external dependency ui that will appear as ${TARGET_PREFIX}_extern_interface outside of this scope.
extern( finish )
